00039 #ifndef RING_H
00040 #define RING_H
00041 
00042 #include <stdint.h>
00043 #include <stdbool.h>
00044 
00045 typedef uint16_t ring_index_t;
00046 typedef uint8_t *ring_buffer_t;
00047 typedef uint8_t ring_count_t;
00048 typedef uint8_t ring_size_t;
00049 typedef struct
00050 {
00051     ring_buffer_t buffer;
00052     ring_size_t size;
00053     ring_index_t head_index;
00054     ring_index_t tail_index;
00055     ring_count_t count;
00056 } ring_t;

00238 /* ring buffer counter initialization */
00239 #define ring_free_count(r)      (((r)->size) - ((r)->count))
